abstract: The industry is facing increasingly vocal protests five years after it began developing a certification system for producing environmentally sustainable palm oil.
snippet: The industry is facing increasingly vocal protests five years after it began developing a certification system for producing environmentally sustainable palm oil.
lead_paragraph: KUALA LUMPUR, Malaysia  Idyllic scenes of palm trees swaying over sandy beaches have long decorated brochures meant to lure tourists to Indonesia and Malaysia. But few visitors see the giant palm plantations away from the shore.

headline.main: Success of Palm Oil Brings Plantations Under Pressure to Preserve Habitats
headline.print_headline: Success of Palm Oil Brings Plantations Under Pressure to Preserve Habitats
